Grouped_Utterances: Hi, Ellie! I’ve been okay. I tried the bedtime routine, and it helped a bit. Yes, I felt a bit more energized, which was nice. Yes, I went to another small get-together, and I tried to engage more. I felt a little less anxious this time. I still get nervous when I think about meeting new people. It makes me want to avoid those situations altogether. It’s been challenging. I still find myself getting frustrated, especially with my dad. Last week, he kept asking me the same questions about my work, and I felt like he wasn’t listening to me. I snapped at him a bit, which I regretted afterward. Overall, I feel more positive, but I still have moments of self-doubt, especially about my job.
I did it four nights out of the week. I still woke up a couple of times, but I felt more relaxed going to bed.

I think practicing the breathing exercises helped. I also reminded myself that it’s okay not to be perfect. That’s common.
